text: Ama chemajia rakip ah hiwa chong jarhi ama'n amajia. Ama chemajia suungnga intak lekkhat kha om, khawa ngaikha akajet tungmak khat-um malung kangirmak mi ngai'n aleiilak Pathian-chong mun ngaikha katuunmak tiang inril angnga akatuunmak tiang inrilsik eii. Khawajarra intheinuo-ah mangnasik inhei-inchoi.
